thread.title: Harapan Youth lodges report over Jamal's hearse 'abuse'
thread.title_full: Harapan Youth lodges report over Jamal's hearse 'abuse'

title: Harapan Youth lodges report over Jamal's hearse 'abuse'
text:
More 
Pakatan Harapan Youth has lodged a police report against Sungai Besar Umno chief Jamal Yunos for allegedly abusing hearses and making fun of Islam. 
The report was made by a delegation led by Selangor PKR Youth chief Afzainizam Rahman at the Shah Alam Police District headquarters today. 
Afzainizam said the report was also made in line with the recent decree by the Selangor Sultan, who chastised those who misused hearses operated by state mosque committees for purposes other than funerary arrangements. 
Also present were Parti Amanah Negara Youth chief Abbas Salimmi, Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia Youth chief Adhif Syan Abdullah and Selangor DAP Youth executive council member Mugheelan.
